title: Ford Will Build a U.S. Battery Factory With Technology From China
description: Ford’s $3.5 billion plant in Michigan will draw on technology from CATL, a Chinese company that is the world’s No. 1 maker of electric-car batteries.

title: This Tool Could Protect Artists From A.I. Image Generators
description: Artists want to be able to post their work online without the fear “of feeding this monster” that could replace them.

title: Beyond Silicon Valley, Spending on Technology Is Resilient
description: Despite an uncertain outlook, corporations plan to continue investing in their digital projects — a source of stability for the economy.

title: Happiness or Success? Salesforce’s Marc Benioff Doesn’t Want to Choose.
description: The chief executive, under pressure from activist investors, seeks to do well and do good — but his options are narrowing.
